concept.title: Software domain elements
concept.shortdesc: The software domain elements are designed for documenting the operation of a software program.

dlentry.dd: Similar to codeph. A server log entry of I:0is equivalent to the text message Information: Successful.
Similar to codeblock. The following are the server block entry codes. I:0 I:1 P:0 P:1
Message number produced by an application or program. A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message Information: Successful
Use the dir to list all the files and folders in the selected directory.
Variable name. Use the dir /p to pause at the end of each page. You need to press a key to see the rest of the information.
The server log is saved in the log.txt file.
Text input by a user. After you type cd.. enter dir at the next prompt.
